name: Infinite Santa - Web
description:
(2020-12-26) Increased Strafe speed.

(2020-12-24) Updated and "finished" the game. Sounds, environment, pickups & powerups were added. Still issues with throwing the Lightbulbs.  Need to fix that but it is going to wait. Settings and scores are not saved, they only exist during game play. ======================================== This game was done for a GameJam (Holistic3D Christmas Game Jam) in 2020 and is incomplete.

Known issues:

Physics glitching when throwing Christmas Lightbulbs.

No Music

No Scoring

No Pick-ups

No Options

No Statistic

No Saves…Seriously, it is incomplete.

I may go back and fix this but I need to finish my Endless Runner in Hodgepodge first.

This is pretty much Create a 3D Endless Runner from Scratch in Unity by Penny de Byl on Udemy. (https://www.udemy.com/course/endlessrunner/)

If you are interested in programming and making games, I recommend the courses by Penny de Byl & Holistic3D (https://holistic3d.com/)

The assets used in this game:

Create a 3D Endless Runner from Scratch in Unity by Penny de Byl

 

SYNTY (https://syntystore.com)

POLYGON - Santa & Christmas (Free stuff: https://syntystore.com/pages/free-assets?_pos=1&_sid=b61a1df78&_ss=r)

POLYGON - Western Pack

Simple Trains

Simple Forest Animals

POLYGON - Particle FX Pack

 

rpgwhitelock (https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/3830)

AllSky Free

Kevin Iglesias (https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/36307)

Basic Motions Pack, Dance Animations Pack, & Melee Warrior Animations

 

Fonts:

Candy Time by House of Lime

Geometr415 Blk BT font for Windows

(All donations will be used to help continuing development of Hodgepodge.)
